Pre-Game Insights: Charith Asalanka has been appointed as the captain of the Sri Lanka ODI squad against India.
The three-match ODI series will be played on the 2nd, 4th, and 7th of August 2024 at the R. Premadasa International Cricket Stadium in Colombo.
Most of the players who featured in Sri Lanka’s last ODI assignment against Bangladesh have retained their places in the squad.
The wicket-keeper batter Nishan Madushka has earned a place in the squad.
